49b7(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi khams kyi rnam par rig pa de bzhin nyid du gyur pa'o// gang zag rtogs pa ni dang po gnyis de bzhin nyid du gyur pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi'o// phyi ma ni nyan thos dang rang sangs 
49b8(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams kyi yang ngo // khyad par rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i khyad par dang / chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i khyad par dang / 
50a1(mdo 'grel): sprul pa'i su thob pa'i khyad par kyang yin te/ mthong ba dang / stod pa dang / 'byor pa brnyes pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ro// dgos pa rtogs pa ni sngon gyi smon la mkhyad par dang / theg pa chen po stanas/ 
50a2(mdo 'grel): ladamigs pa'i khyad par gyi dang // sa bcu la rab tu sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi phyir ro// gnas rtog pa ni/ rnam pa drug gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa drug gis rtogs pa nyid ni dmigs pa las dang / mtshan/ 
50a3(mdo 'grel): ma yongs su spangs las dang / yang dag par sbyor ba las dang / mtshan nyid kyi phyir dang / phan yon gyi phyir dang / yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa bzhis dmigs pa rtogs pa ste// theg pa chen po ston pa 
50a4(mdo 'grel): dang / de la mos pa dang / nges pa dang / tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis so// rnam pa bzhis mtshan ma spong ba rtogs ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i phyogs dang / de bzhin nyid dang / rtogs 
50a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos kyi mtshan ma yongs su spong ba las te/ rags pa dang babring po dang / pra ba dang / ring du rjes su 'gro ba'i mtshan ma yongs su spong ba rnams grangs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dis yang dag par bstan pa yin no// yang da/ 
50a6(mdo 'grel): par sbyor ba rtogs pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ dmigs pa'i sbyor ba las dang / mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba las dang / dmigs pa mi dmigs pa nyid du sbyor ba las dang / mi dmigs pa dmigs par sbyor ba las so// 
50a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid rtogs pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ chos nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ni gnyis su med pa brjod pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// spang ba med pa'i phyir ni gnyis dang / ji ltar brjod 
50a8(mdo 'grel): pa dang / dbang po dang / yul dang / rnam par rigs dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnams su snang ba med pa'i phyir ro// de rnams kyis ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ gnas med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par 
50b1(mdo 'grel): rig pa med pa/ rten med pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so// zhes ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid de gsal bar bstan pa yin no// snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil ltar chos thams cad 
50b2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro// phan yon rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos kyi sku rdzogs par rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / gang na med pa'i bde ba'i gnas// 
50b3(mdo 'grel): pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / mthong ba'i phyir dang / mthong ba'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / ston pa'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro// yongs su shes pa las rtogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ gnyen po 
50b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / khyad par yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang / las yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro// de la gnyen pa yongs su shes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i 
50b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes te/ chos dang / gang zag dang / gyur pa dang / tha dad pa dang / skur pa lnga ni bden pa'i ngo bo las zhen pa'i gnyen po'o// mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ni/ yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par 'das pa dang / 
50b6(mdo 'grel): nye bar ni ba dang / de ba'i don dang / bkra bar 'dzin pa lnga spangs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do// khyad par yongs su shes pa ni rtog pa med pa dang / phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang / gnas pa med pa nyid dang / gtan du ba 
50b7(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / gong na med pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyi phyir ro// las yongs su shes pa ni/ rnam par rtog par ming du byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba sbyin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar sbyor/ 
50b8(mdo 'grel): ba dang / de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong par byed// 
51a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa ldan las kyi khyad par ro// yid la byed partogs pa ni/ dzi ga dadu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dortogs par 'dod pa de 'di ltar yid la byed pa/ de bzhin nyid min 
51a2(mdo 'grel): pa theg ma med pa'i dus can las te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtogs pas sa bon thams cad pa ste/ mi bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu dang / de la brten pa tha dad pa yang yin te de la rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa snang 
51a3(mdo 'grel): du zin kyang mi bden pa yin no// de ltar snang bas kyang de'i chos nyid ni snang ba med la/ de snang ba med las kyang chos nyid snang ba yin no zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 
51a4(mdo 'grel): rtog pa yin no// de ltar nye bar dmigs pa las rnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa rtogs par byed do// rnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa las don thams cad dmigs pa med par byed do// don thams cad 
51a5(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa med pa las rnam par rigs pa tsam yang mi dmigs par rtogs par byed do// de mi dmigs pa las gnyi ga khyad par dmigs pa rtogs par byed pa yin no// der gang yang gnyis dmigs pa med pa de ni rnam 
51a6(mdo 'grel): par mi rtag pa'i ye shes te/ yul med cing dmigs pa med pa yinan/ mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas nabang mtshan pa nyid kyi phyir ra// sbyor brtags pa ni rnam pa pazhi ste/ mos pas spyod pa'i sa lams pas 
51a7(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de nyid nges par 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so// de nyid sa dang po la so sor rig par sbyor ba'i phyir dang // de nyid ni reg pa'i gnas skabs so// rnam par ma dag pa'i sa drug la sgom pa la rab tu sbyor 
51a8(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir dang / yongs su dag pa gsum po la yang ngo // de nyid ni rjes su dran pa'i gnas skabs so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la mthar phyin pa la sbyor ba'i phyir te/ lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 
51b1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// de nyid ni de'i bdag nyid ni rjes su dran pa'i gnas skabs so// nyes dmigs rtogs pa ni/ gnas skabs su gyur pa med na'o// nyes dmigs rnam pa bzhi ste/ nyon mongs pa mi 'jug pa'i rten med pa'i nyes 
51b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs dang / lam 'jug pa'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs dang / gang zag mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad bzhag pa'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs dang / byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par gyi tha snyad bzhag pa'i rten med 
51b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i zhes dmigs so// de dag las bzlog pa la brten nas gnas yongs su gyur pa yod pa la/ phan yon rnam pa bzhi nyid du rig par bya'o// de dag nyid ni gnas gyur pa ji lta bar rtogs pa rnam pa bcu rig par bya'o// med pa'i 
51b4(mdo 'grel): chos snang ba ni/ dper ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin no// gnas gyur pa'i dpe ni/ nam mkha' dang gser dang tshu la sogs pa bzhin no// chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa 
51b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan pa paN+Di ta shAn ti b+hang+ga dang / zhu chen gyi lan+d+ha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slad kyi kha che'i mkhan po paN+Dita par he ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo na pa 
51b6(mdo 'grel): dge slong dag 'a rjod gyis thugs dmas tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du bcas shing gtan la phab pa// gas sa/ #// rgya gar ska du/ d+hamanam hA ba~M b+ha ga Tha ra~M k+Sha/ 
51b7(mdo 'grel): gad du/ chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i chog le'u byas pa/ mgon pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shes nas 'ga' zhig yongs su spang ba zhing // gzhan 'ga' zhig ni mngon sum nyid du bya// des na 
51b8(mdo 'grel): dgas can nyid na ma dbyag// byed par 'dod pas bstan btsas 'di brtsam mo// 'di dag thams cad mdor bsdun// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// tshe sa dang dbazhin chos nyid kyi// thams cad bsdus panyid kying 
52a1(mdo 'grel): ro// de la chos kyis phye ba ni// 'khor ba yin te chos nyid kyis// rab tu phye ba theg gsum gyi// mya ngan las ni 'das pa'o// de las chos kyis mtshan nyid ni// gnyis dang ji ltar mngon brjod par// 
52a2(mdo 'grel): snang ba yang dag ma yin pa'i// kun rtog pa ste med snang phyir// des na yang dag ma yin pa'o// de yang thams cad don med cing // rtog tsam yin pas kun rtog pa'o// gzhan yang chos nyid mtshan nyid ni// gzung ba dang 
52a3(mdo 'grel): ni 'dzin pa dang // brjod par bya dang rjod par byed// khyad med de bzhin nyid yin no// med pa snang phyir 'khrul pa ni// kun nas nyon mongs rlung yin te// sgyu ma'i glang chen sgo snang bzhin// yod pa yang ni mi snang phyir// 
52a4(mdo 'grel): med snang dag las gang rung zhig/ med na 'phrul dang ma 'khrul dang // de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam par byung ba mi 'thad do// gnyis po dag ni gcig nyid dang // so so ba yang ma yin te// yod pa dang ni med 
52a5(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ khyad par yod dang med phyir ro// rnam pa drug gis chos rnams la// 'jug pa bla na med pa ste// mtshan nyid dang ni grub pa ste// gcig dang tha dad ma yin zhing // gnas ni thun par thun mong min// gzung 
52a6(mdo 'grel): 'ang 'dzin par snang ba ni// med la rab tu 'jug pas so// de la mtshan nyid grub pa dang // gcig dang tha dad ma yin pa// ji ltar mdor bstan bzhin du'o// gang zhig gang du 'khor ba na// de ni kun tu gnas pa ste// / 
52a7(mdo 'grel): sems can khams dang snod kyi khams// snod kyi khams ni thun mongs ltar// rnam par rig pa thun mong yin// sems can khams ni thun mong dang // yang na thung mong ma yin pa'o// de la skye dang tha snyad dang // 
52a8(mdo 'grel): rjes su bzung dang tshar bcad dang // phan pa dang ni gnod pa dang // yon tan skyon ni phan tshun du// bdag po nyid kyis phan tshun du// yin pa'i phyir na thun mong pa'o// gnas dang rnam par rig pa dang // bde sdug las 
52b1(mdo 'grel): dang 'chi 'pho dang // skye ba dang ni bcings pa dang // grol ba thun mong ma yin phyir// de nas thun mong ma yin pa'o// phyi rol bzung ba thun mong bar// snang ba 'dzin pa'i rnam rig pa'o// rnam par shes las phyi rol 
52b2(mdo 'grel): tu// gyur pa'i don yod ma yin te// thun mong pa nyid yin gyir ro// cig shos thun mong ma yin pa'i// gzung ba rnam par rig pa'i don// gzhan gyi sems la sogs pa ni// mnyam par ma bzhag mnyam gzhag 
52b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i// 'dzin pa'i rnam par rig pa la// phan tshun yul gyur ma yin te// mnyam pa ma bzhag pa la ni// rang gi na ma rtog snang phyir dang // mnyam par bzhag pa dag la ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul de'i// gzugs 
52b4(mdo 'grel): brnyan rab tu snang phyir ro// gzung bar snang ba med grub na// 'dzin par snang ba med grub bo// de las kyang ni bzung ba dang // 'dzin par snang ba med pa la// 'jug pa grub ste thog med pa'i// kun nas ldang ba grub pas 
52b5(mdo 'grel): so// gnyis su yongs su ma grub par// rab tu grub par yin phyir ro// rnam pa drug gis chos nyid la// 'jug pa bla na med pa ste// mtshan nyid kun tu gnas pa dang // nges par 'byed dang reg pa dang // rjes su dran da 
52b6(mdo 'grel): dadag // nyabang sen la jug pas pa// mtshan nyid mdan jil bzhin// gnas ni rdzas rnams thams da// rin kyang med sde thams dbyung // de ladas par 'gyung ban// theg pa can pa'i mad sngal/ 
52b7(mdo 'grel): brten pa'i tshul bzhin yid byed pas// bsdus pa'i sbyor lam thams cad do// reg pa yang dag lta thob phyir// mthong ba'i lam gyi mngon gsum gyi// tshul du de bzhin nyid thob cing // nyams su myong ba gang yin 
52b8(mdo 'grel): pa'o// rjes su dran pa reg pas ni// mthong ba'i don la sgom lam gyi// byang chub phyogs kyis bsdus pa ste// de yi dri ma sel ba'i phyir// de la de yi bdag nyid du// nye bar son pa de bzhin nyid// dri ma med 
53a1(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa na// thams cad de bzhin nyid tsam du// snang ba de yang gnas gyur pa// grub pa yin no rnam pa bcus// gnas yod gyur la 'jug pa ni// bla na med pa nyid yin te// ngo bo rdzas dang gang 
53a2(mdo 'grel): zag dang // khyad par dgos pa gnas dang ni// yid la byed dang sbyor ba dang // nyes dmigs phan yon 'jug pas so// de la ngo bo 'jug pa ni// glo bur pa yi dri ma dang // de bzhin nyid ni snang ba dang // snang ba'i don te de 
53a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid// dri ma med pa gang yin pa'o// dngos po rdzas la 'jug pa ni// thun mong snod kyi rnam rig pa// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // mdo sde chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // thun mong min pa 
53a4(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi// khams kyi rnam par rig pa yi// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa'o// gang zag dag la 'jug pa ni// dang po gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// de bzhin nyid yongs gyur pa
53a5(mdo 'grel): ste// phyi ma nyan thos rnams dang ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi yang yin no// khyad par can la 'jug pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zhing yongs su dag pa'i khyad par dang // chos sku longs spyod 
53a6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa dang // sbrul sku thob pas gzigs pa dang // 'doms pa dang ni dbang 'byor nyid// thob pa'i khyad par las yin no// dgos pa rtogs la 'jug pa ni// sngon gyi smon lam khyad par dang // theg pa chen pos 
53a7(mdo 'grel): ston pa yis// dmigs pa'i khyad par sa bcu la// rab tu sbyor ba'i khyad par ro// gnas sam rten la 'jug pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes la// 'jug pa rnam pa drug gis te// dmigs dang mtshan ma spangs pa dang // 
53a8(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa yi sbyor ba dang // mtshan nyid dang ni phan yon dang // yongs su shes la 'jug pas so// de la dang po dmigs pa la// 'jug pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste// theg pa chen po ston pa dang // de la mos dang des// 
53b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang // tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pas so// gnyis pa mtshan ma spangs pa la// 'jug pa yang ni rnam bzhi ste// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dang // de bzhin nyid dang rtogs pa dang // mtshan ma dag ni spangs pas/ 
53b2(mdo 'grel): so// 'dir ni rim pa ji lta bzhin// rags dang 'bring dang phra mo dang // ring du rjes su 'brel paM yi// mtshan ma yongs su spangs pa yin// yang dag pa yi sbyor ba la// 'jug pa yang ni rnam bzhi ste// dmigs pa/ 
53b3(mdo 'grel): yi ni sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs pa yi sbyor ba dang // dmigs pa mi dmigs sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs dmigs pa'i sbyor ba'o// de la mtshan nyid 'jug pa ni// rnam pa gsum gyis shes bya ste// chos nyid 
53b4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa nyid las ni// gnyis su med cing brjod med pa'i// chos nyid rab tu gnas phyir ro// snang ba med las gnyis dang ni// ji ltar mngon par brjod pa dang // dbang po yul rnam rig pa dang // snod kyi 'jig rten 
53b5(mdo 'grel): snang med phyir// des na 'dis ni brtag med pa// bstan du med pa gnas med pa// snang ba med cing rnam rig med// gnas pa med pa zhes bya ste// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// mtshan nyid mdo bzhin brjod pa yin// / 
53b6(mdo 'grel): snang ba las ni chos thams cad// nam mkha'i dkyil mnyam snang phyir ro// 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma sogs// lta bur snang ba yin phyir ro// phan yon 'jug pa rnam bzhi ste// chos sku rdzogs par thob pa dang / 
53b7(mdo 'grel): gong ni med pa'i bde thob dang // gzigs pa dbang sbyor thob pa dang // ston la dbang 'byor thob pa dang // yongs su shes la 'jug pa ni// rnam pa bani ru shes bya ste// gnyen po yongs su shes pa dang // mtshan nyid 
53b8(mdo 'grel): yongs su shes pa dang // khyad par yongs su shes pa dang // las lnga yongs su shes pa'o// de la gnyen po shes pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes de// chos dang gang zag 'dzin pa dang // yongs su 'gyur ba 
54a1(mdo 'grel): tha dad dang // skur pa 'debs pa nyid yin te// med pa 'dzin pa rnam lnga'i// gnyen po bstan pa yin phyir ro// mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ni// yid la mi byed yang dag 'das// nye bar zhi dang ngo 
54a2(mdo 'grel): bo'i don// mngon brtags 'dzin pa rnam pa lnga// spangs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid do// khyad par yongs su shes pa ni// rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang // nyi tshe ba ni ma yin dang // gnas med pa dang gtan du dang // gong
54a3(mdo 'grel): na med pa'i rnam pa ste// khyad par rnam pa lnga yin no// tha ma las yongs shes pa ni// rnam rtog ring du byed pa dang // bla na med pa'i bde stong dang // nyon mongs pa dang shes bya yi// sgrib pa bral bar byed pa dang // de yi rjes
54a4(mdo 'grel): las thob pa yi// ye shes shes bya'i rnam pa ni// thams cad la ni 'jug pa dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni spong ba dang // sems can yongs su smin byed dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// gtod cing ster bar byed pa ste// 
54a5(mdo 'grel): rnam lnga las kyi khyad par ro// yid la byed la 'jug pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes la// 'jug par 'dod pa'i gang zag ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa// 'di ltar yid la byed pa ste// de bzhin nyid ni mi shes 
54a6(mdo 'grel): pas// mi bden par ni yongs brtag pa'i// sa bon thams cad bzhes pa// med pa gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu// de la rten pa'i tha dad rbA// des na rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas// snang du zin kyang med pa'o// de snang chos nyid mi 
54a7(mdo 'grel): snang zhing // de mi snang bas chos nyid snang // de ltar tshul bzhin yid byed na// byang chub sems dpa' mi rtog pa'i// ye shes la ni 'jug pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam rig tsam// dmigs dang rnam par rig tsam du// 
54a8(mdo 'grel): dmigs las don rnams mi dmigs dang // don rnams mi dmigs pa las ni// rnam par rig tsam mi dmigs dang // de mi dmigs las gnyis po ni// byed par med pa'i dmigs la 'jug/ de gnyis khyad par mi dmin 
54b1(mdo 'grel): rnams// de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i// ye shes yul med dmigs med pa// mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas// rab bye ba ni yin phyir ro// sbyor bas sa la 'jug pa ni// rnam pa bani ru shes bya ste// mos pa'i 
54b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu sbyor bas ni// mos pas spyod pa'i sa la ste// nges pas 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so// so sor rab tu rtog pa yi// sbyor bas sa ni dang po ste// de nyid reg pa'i gnas skabs so// bsgom pas rab tu sbyor 
54b3(mdo 'grel): bas ni// ma dag pa yis sa drug dang // dag pa'i sa ni gsum po ste// de ni rjes dran gnas skabs so// mthar byin pa la sbyor bas ni// ldan gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyis// mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad phyir ro// de 
54b4(mdo 'grel): ni de yi bdag nyid du// nye bar 'gro ba'i gnas skabs so// nyes dmigs dag la 'jug pa ni// gnas yongs gyur pa med pa yi// nyes dmigs bzhi ste nyon mongs pa// mi 'jug rten med nyes pa dang // lam
54b5(mdo 'grel): 'dug rten med nyes pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i gang zag rnams// gdags pa'i gzhi med nyes pa dang // byang chub gsum gyi khyad par dag/ gdags pa'i bzhi med nyes pa'o// bzlog nas phan yon 'jug pa ni// 
54b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa bzhi du shes par bya// med pa'i chos rnams snang ba'i dpe// snum rmi la ma la sogs bzhin// gnas yangs gyur pa dper byad// nam mkha' gser dang chu sogs bzhin// tshas dang chos nyid rnam par 
54b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa// mgon po byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta chen po ma hA dza na dang / lo tsA ba dge bsnyen seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis bskur ba'o// @#// / theg pa chen po d+had pa pa'i bstan bcos bzhugs so// 
54b8(mdo 'grel): / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yA nod+ha ra tar+b+ha shAs+t+ra/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos tshogs khams 
55a1(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub dang / yon mgon sangs rgyas phrin las tha ma ste// bstan bcos kun gyi lus ni mdor bsdu na// rdo rje yi ni gnas bdun 'di dag go/ 'di dag rang mtshan nyid kyis rjes 'brel bar// go ram 
55a2(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin gzungs kyi rgyal po'i mdor// gleng gni las ni gnas gsum rig bya ste// bzhi ni blo ldan rgyal chos dbye ba las// sangs rgyas las chos chos las 'phags pa'i tshogs// tshogs las snying po ye shes 
55a3(mdo 'grel): khams 'thob mthar// ye shes de 'thob byang chub mchog stobs sogs// sems can kun don byed chos rnams dang ldan// gang zhig thog ma dbus mtha' med ni sangs rgyas nyid rang rnam sangs rgyas// sangs/ 
55a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas nas ni ma rtags rtags phyir 'jig med rtag pa'i lam ston pa// mkhyen brtse'i ral gri rdo rje mchog bsnams sdug bsngal myu gu gcod mdzad cig/ sna tshogs lta thibs kyis bskor the tsom rtsig pa 'dzag mdzad dal 
55a5(mdo 'grel): 'dud// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// gzhan gyis rten gyis rtag min la// mkhyen dang brtse dang nus par ldan// don gnyis ldan pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// thog ma dbus mtha' med pa yi// rang bzhin yin 
55a6(mdo 'grel): phyir 'dus ma byas// zhib chos kyi sku can phyir// lhun gyis grub ces bya bar brjod// so so rang gi rtogs bya'i phyir// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs min pa// de ltar rnams gsum rtogs phyir mkhyer// lam ston gyi 
55a7(mdo 'grel): nathugs brtseg/ nus pa ye shes thugs rje yis// sdug bsngal nyon mongs spong phyir ro// dang po gsum gyis rang don te// phyi ma gsum gyis gzhan don yin// gang zhig med min yod min yod med ma yon 
55a8(mdo 'grel): yod med las gzhan du'ang // brtag par me rus nges tshig dang bral so so rang gis rigazhi ga/ dri med ye shes 'od zer snang ldan dmigs pa kun la chags pa dang // sdang dang rab rib rnam par 'joms mdzad dam chos nyi ma 
55b1(mdo 'grel): de la 'dud// bsam med gnyis med rtog med pa// dgagasal gnyen po'i phyogs nyid kyis// gang zhig gang gis chags bral ba// bden gnyis mtshan nyid can da chos// chags bral zhid ni 'gog pa dang / 
55b2(mdo 'grel): lam gyi bden pa dag gis bsdus// ge me de bzhin de dag kyang // yon tan gsum gsum gyis rig bya// brtag min phyir dang brjod min phyer// 'phags pas mkhyen phyi rabasam med zhed// ni nyid gnyis med rtag 
55b3(mdo 'grel): med de// rag sogs gsum ni nye bzhin no// sems de rang bzhin 'ad gsal bas na nyon mongs rab med gzigs pas// gang zag 'gro kun bdag med mtha' zhi yang dag rtogs nas thams cad la// rdzogs pa'i sangs 
55b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas rdzas zhugs gzigs pa sgrib pa med pa'i thamanga' ba// sems can rnam dag mtha' yas yul can ye shes gzigs mnga'adi la 'dung// de bzhin ji snyed nang shi ni// ye shes gzigs pa dag pa'i phyir/ 
55b5(mdo 'grel): blo ldan phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs// bla med yon tan dang ldan nyid// 'gro bzhi pa'i chos nyid du// rtogs phyir ni lha nyid de yang // rang bzhin gyis ni yongs dag phyir// nyon mongs gdad nas zad phyir ro// shes bya 
55b6(mdo 'grel): mthar thug rtogs pa'i blos// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid ni// sems can thams cad la yod pa// mthong phyir ji snyed yod pa nyid// de ltar rtogs pa gang yin te// so so dang shes mthong ba nyid// dri med 
55b7(mdo 'grel): dbyings la chags med dang // thogs med phyir de dag pa yid// ye shes gzigs pa dag pas na// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med phyir// 'phags pa phyid mi ldog pa ni// lus can kun gyi skyabs yin no// 
55b8(mdo 'grel): ston pa bstan pa slob don gyi// theg pa gsum dang byed gsum la// mos pa rnams kyi dbang byas nas// skyabs gsum rnam par bzhag pa yin// spang phyir slu ba'i chas can phyir// med byed 'jigs dang pa 
56a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir// chos rnam gnyis dang 'phags pa'i tshogs// gtan gyi skyabs mchog ma yin no// dam pa'i don du 'gro ba yi// skyabs ni sangs rgyas nyagacig yin// thub pa chos kyi sku can phyir// 
56a2(mdo 'grel): tshegs kyang de yi mthar thug phyir// 'byung ba dkon phyir dri med phyir// mthu ldan phyir dang 'jig rten gyi// rgyan gyur phyir dang mchog nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med phyir dkon mchog nyid// dri bcas de bzhin nyid dang dri ma med// / 
56a3(mdo 'grel): dri med sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal ba'i mdzod// gang las dkon mchog pa gsum 'byung ba// don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi yul nyid do// dkon mchog gsum po 'di yi rigs// thams cad gzigs pa rnams// 
56a4(mdo 'grel): kyi yul// de yang rnam bzhi go rim bzhin// rgyu bzhi yis ni bsam mi khyab// dag dang nyon mongs dang ldan phyir// kun nas nyon mongs med dag phyir// rnam par dbye ba med chos phyir// lhun grub rnam par mi rtog phyir// 
56a5(mdo 'grel): rtogs bya rtogs pa de yi ni// yan lag rtogs par byed phyir te// go rim ji bzhin gnas gcig ste// dag rgyu gsum ni rkyen yin no// rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang // de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang // rigs/ 
56a6(mdo 'grel): yod phyir na lus can kun// rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can// de bo rgyu 'bras las ldan 'jug pa dang // gnas skabs de kun tu 'gro ba'i don// rtag tu mi 'gyur yon tan dbyer med ni// don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don 
56a7(mdo 'grel): yin shes bya// rin chen nam mkha' chu dag bzhin// rtag tu rang bzhin nyon mongs med// chos mos lhag pa'i shes rab dang // ting 'dzin snying rje las byung ba// mthu dang gzhan du mi 'gyur dang // brlan pa'i ngo 
56a8(mdo 'grel): bo rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag nor bu rin chen mkha'// chu yi yon tan chos mthun nyid// chos la khong khro bdag lta dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang // sems can don la ltos med nyid// 'dod 
56b1(mdo 'grel): chen mu stegs nyan thos dang // dang 'byung rnams kyi sgrib rnam bzhi// dag rgyu lhag par smos pa las// sogs pa'i chos ni rnam bzhi nyid// theg mchog la mos sa bon shes rab ni// sangs rgyas chos bskyed ma
56b2(mdo 'grel): dang bsam gtan gyi// bde ba mngal gnas snying rje'i lam can// gang yin de dag thub pa'i rjes skyes sras// gtsang bdag bde dang rtag nyid kyi// yon tan pha rol phyin pa 'bras// sdug bsngal yid 'byung zhi thob 
56b3(mdo 'grel): par// 'dun dang smon pa'i las can no// 'di dag 'bras ni mdor bsdu na// chos kyi sku la phyin ci log/ rnam pa bzhi las bzlog pa yi// gnyen pos rab tu phye ba nyid// de ni rang bzhin dag phyir dang // bag chags
56b4(mdo 'grel): spangs kyir gtsang ba yin// bag dang bdag med spros pa dag/ nye bar zhi bas dam pa'i bdag/ yid kyi rang bzhin phung po dang // de rgyu log phyir bde ba nyid// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// mnyam pa nyid du rtog 
56b5(mdo 'grel): phyir rtag/ bdag sred ma lus shes rab kyis bcad de// sems can sred phyir brtse ldan zhi thob min// de ltar blo brtse byang chub thabs bsten nas// 'phags pa 'khor ba 'am mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur// gal te
56b6(mdo 'grel): yod las yin gang phyir de// rigs med dag la med phyir ro// rgya mtsho che bzhin dpag med pa// yon tan rin chen mi zad gnas// dbyer med yod tan dang ldan pa'i// ngo bo nyid phyid mar me bzhin// chos sku/ 
56b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i ye shes dang // thugs rje'i khams ni bsdus pa'i phyir// snod dang rin chen chu yis 'di// rgya mtsho dang ni mtshungs par bstan// dri med gnas la mngon shes dang // ye shes dri med de nyid dang // rnam 
57a1(mdo 'grel): dbye med phyir mar me yi// snang dang dro mdog chos mtshungs can// so so'i skye 'phags rdzogs sangs kyi// de bzhin nyid dbye'i 'jug pa las// de nyid gzigs pas sems can la// rgyal po'i
57a2(mdo 'grel): snying po 'di bstan to// so so'i skye bo phyin ci log/ bden pa mthong ba bzlog pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bzhin// phyin ci log pasmos med nyid// ma dag ma dag dag pa dang // shin tu rnam dag go rim bzhin// 
57a3(mdo 'grel): sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do// ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i don// 'di drug gis ni bsdus pa yi// khams ni gnas skabs gsum dag du// ming gsum gyis ni 
57a4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa nyid// ji ltar rtog med bdag nyid can// nam mkha' kun tu rjes song ltar// sems kyi rang bzhin dri med dbyings// de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba nyid// de spyi'i mtshan nyid nyes pa dang // yon tan mthar thug 
57a5(mdo 'grel): khyab pa ste// gzug gyi rnam pa dman pa dang // bar ma mchog la nam mkha' bzhin// nyes pa glo bur dang ldan dang // yon tan rang bzhin nyid ldan phyir// ji ltar sngar bzhin gyis de bzhin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos
57a6(mdo 'grel): nyid do// ji ltar nam mkha' kun song ba// phra zhing nye bar gos pa med// de bzhin sems can thams cad la// gnas 'di nye bar gos pa med// ji ltar 'jig rten thams cad du// nam mkha' las ni skye zhing 'jig/ 
57a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'dus ma byas dbyings la// dbang po rnams ni skye zhing 'jig/ ji ltar nam mkha' me rnams kyis// sngon chad nam yang tshig pa med// de bzhin 'di ni 'chi ba dang // na dang rga ba'i mes ma 'tshig/ sa ni chu la chu drung // / 
57a8(mdo 'grel): la// rlung ni mkha' la rab tu gnas// mkha' ni rlung dang chu dag dang // sa yi khams la gnas ma yin// de bzhin phung po khams dbang rnams// las dang nyon mongs dag la gnas// las dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin 
57b1(mdo 'grel): min// yid la byed la rtag tu gnas// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni// sems kyi dag pa la rab gnas// sems kyi rab bzhin chos rnams ni// thams cad la yang gnas pa med// sa dang 'dra bar phung po dang // 
57b2(mdo 'grel): skye mched khams rnams shes par bya// chu khams dang 'dra lus can gyis// las dang nyon mongs shes bya ste// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bar blta// rang bzhin nam mkha'i khams bzhin// / 
57b3(mdo 'grel): du// de bzhin can min gnas pa med// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni// sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed kyis// las dang nyon mongs rab tu phye// las dang nyon mongs chu las ni// 
57b4(mdo 'grel): phung po skye mched khams rnams 'byung // de 'jig pa dang chags pa dang // skye dang 'jig par 'gyur ba yin// sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' yi// khams ltar rgyu med rkyen med de// tshogs pa med cing skye ba dang // 
57b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig pa gnas pa'ang yod ma yin// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa// de ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med de// yang dag min rtog las byung 'dod chags sogs// glo bur dri mas de nyon mongs mi 'gyur// / 
57b6(mdo 'grel): las dang nyon mongs chu tshogs kyis// 'di ni mngon par 'grub min te// 'chi dang na dang rga ba'i me// mi bzad pas kyang tshig mi 'gyur// dus mtha' dmyal ba tha mal pa'i// me gsum 'chi dang na ba dang // rga ba'i me gsum 
57b7(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin du// de dang 'dra bar shes par bya// skye 'chin dang rga ba las grol ba// 'di yi rang bzhin ji bzhin nyid rtogs te// skye sogs 'phongs dang bral yang de yis rgyus// blo ldan 'gro la snying rje bskyed phyir bsten// / 
57b8(mdo 'grel): 'phags pas 'chi dang na ba dang // rga ba'i sdug bsngal rtsa nas spangs// las dang nyon mongs dbang gis skye// de la de med phyir da med// ji bzhin yang dag mthong ba'i phyir// skye sogs rnams las 'das gyur kyang / 
58a1(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i bdag nyid skye ba dang // 'chi dang rga dang na bar ston// rgyal sras 'gyur med chos nyid 'di// rtogs nas ma rig ljongs rnams kyi// skye ba la sogs dag tu ni// mthong ba gang yin te smad do// 
58a2(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i spyod yul thob pa gang // byis pa'i spyod yul du ston te// de nyid phyir ngan 'gro ba yi// gnyen gyis thabs dang snying rje'i mchog/ de ni 'jig rten thams cad las// 'das kyang 'jig rten lasam g.yos/ 
58a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten don du 'jig rten na// 'jig rten dri mas mgos spyod// ji ltar pad+ma chu nang du// skyes pa chu yis gos pa med// de bzhin 'di ni 'jig rten du// skyes kyang 'jig rten chos mi gos// bya ba sgrub la rtag tu blo// 
58a4(mdo 'grel): mi bzhin du ni 'bar ba dang // zhi ba'i bsam gtan snyoms 'jug la// rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa yin// sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang dang ni// rnam rtog thams cad bral ba'i phyir// de ni lus can smin pa yi// don du 
58a5(mdo 'grel): 'bad pa byed ma yin// bstan dang gzugs sku dag dang ni// spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung // gang zhig ji ltar gang gis 'dul// des de de ltar nyid du shes// de ltar nam mkha'i mtha' klas kyis// 'gro ba rtag tu
58a6(mdo 'grel): lhan grub par// thogs med blo ldan de yi ni// sems can don no yang dag 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'di ni// rjes thob de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // sems can yang dag sgrol ba la// 'jig rten na ni
58a7(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa nyid// de lta mos kyi sa rdul dang // rgya mtsho ba lang rmig rjes kyi// khyad par gang yin sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyad de nyid// gzhan 'gyur min bdag mi zad chos ldan phyir// 'gro skyabs 
58a8(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i mtha' med mur zug phyir// de ni rtag tu gnyis med mi rtog phyir// 'jig med chos kyang ma byas rang bzhin phyir// skye ba med cing 'chi ba med// gnod med rga ba med pa ste// de ni rtag dang brtan phyir dang // zhi ba'i phyir 
58b1(mdo 'grel): dang g.yung drung phyir// de ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis// lus kyi skye med rtag pa'i phyir// bsam gyis mi khyab bsgyur ba yis// 'chi 'pho brtan phyir de mi 'chi// bag chags phra mo'i nad rnams kyis// gnod med bzhi nyid 
58b2(mdo 'grel): kyi phyir// zag med mngon par 'dus byas kyis// g.yung drung phyir na rga ba med// de la tshig gnyis de bzhin gnyis// gnyis dang gnyis kyis go rim bzhin// 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings la ni// rtag pa la sogs don shes 
58b3(mdo 'grel): bya// me zad yon tan dang ldan phyir// gzhan 'gyur min bdag rtag pa'i don// mtha' yi ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir// skyabs kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i don// rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin phyir// gnyis med chos nyid zhi ba'i 
58b4(mdo 'grel): don// ma bcos yon tan nyid phyir ni// 'jig med don ni g.yung drung nyid// gang phyid de ni tshes sku de ni de bzhin gshegs// de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa den dam mya ngan 'das// de phyir nyi dang zer bzhin yon tan dbyer med 
58b5(mdo 'grel): pas// sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs mya ngan 'das pa med// mdor na zag med dbyings la ni// don gyi rab tu dbye ba bzhis// chos kyi sku la sogs pa yi// rnam grangs bzhir ni rig par bya// sangs rgyas chos 
58b6(mdo 'grel): dbyer med pa dang // de rigs de bzhin thob pa dang // brdzun med sla med chos nyid dang // 'dod nas rang bzhin zhi nyid do// rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang // dri ma bag chags bcas spangs pa// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das 
58b7(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ dam pa'i don du gnyis med nyid// rnam pa thams cad grangs med pa// bsam med dri med yon tan dang // dbyer med mtshan nyid thar pa ste// thar pa gang de de bzhin gshegs// ji ltar ri mo 'dri byed pa// 
58b8(mdo 'grel): gzhan dang gzhan la mkhas pa dag/ gang zhig yan lag gang shes pa// de gzhan nges 'dzin med par 'gyur// de nas 'di la khyed kun gyis// nga yi gzugs ni gyis shig ces// mnga' bdag rgyal pos de dag la 
59a1(mdo 'grel): bka' yis ras ni byin pa na// de nas de ni zos gyur te// ri mo'i las la rab sbyor ro// de las mngon par spyod rnams las// gcig cig yul gzhan song gyur na// de ni yul gzhan song bas na/ 
59a2(mdo 'grel): de ma tshang phyir ri mo de// yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs par// mi 'gyur bzhin zhes dper byas so// de rnams 'dri byed gang yin pa// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod la sogs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan 
59a3(mdo 'grel): pa// stong pa nyid ni gzugs su brjod// shes rab ye shes rnam grol rnams// gsal dang 'gro dang dag phyir dang // tha dad med phyir 'od dang zer// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang mtshungs// des na sangs rgyas 
59a4(mdo 'grel): mthob par// mya ngan 'das pa me 'thob ste// 'od dang 'od zer spangs nas ni// nyi ma lta bar mi nus bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i snying po ni// rnam gzhag rnam pa bcu zhes brjod// nyon mongs sbubs nang gnas pa'o// 
59a5(mdo 'grel): dpe dag gis ni shes par bya// sangs rgyas pad nang sbrang rtsi sbrang ma la// spun la snying po mi gtsang nang na gser// sa la gter dang myug sogs 'bras phyung dang // gos hrul nang na rgyal ba'i sku dang ni// bud med 
59a6(mdo 'grel): ngan pa'i lton mi bdag dang // sa la rin chen gzugs yod ji lta bur// blo bur nyon mongs dri mas bsgribs pa yi// sems can rnams la de bzhin khams de gnas// dri ma pad+ma sogs chags sbun pa mi 
59a7(mdo 'grel): gtsangs 'bras gos hrul dang // sdug bsngal 'bar bas mngon par gdungs pa'i bud med sa yi khams dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po gser dang gter dang mya gro rin chen sku// gling bdag mchog dang rin 
59a8(mdo 'grel): chechen gzugs dang dri med khams mchog mtshungs pa nyid// ji ltar mdog ngan pad+ma'i khong gnas pa// mtshan stong gis 'bang de bzhin gshegs pa ni// dri med lha yi mig ldan mi mthong nas// chu skyes 'dab ma'i srung sa// 
59b1(mdo 'grel): ra'abyin byed pa// de bzhin bde gshegs panar med gnas rnams la// sangs rgyas spyan gyis rang chos nyid gzigs te// sgrib med kyi mtha' mur gnas snying rje yi// bdag can sgrib pa las ni sgrol bar byed/ 
59b2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar mi sdug pad+ma zlum la bde bar gshegs pa ni// de yi khong gnas lha mig mthong nas 'dab ma gcod byed ltar// chags sdang sogs dri sbubs bsgribs rdzogs sangs snying po 'gro gzigs te// thugs rjes thub 
59b3(mdo 'grel): pa de bzhin sgrib pa de ni 'joms par mdzad// ji ltar srog chags tshegs bskor sbrang rtsi ni// skyes bu mkhas pa de don gnyer ba yis// mthong nas de dang thabs kyi srog chags tshogs// kun nas 'bras par rab tu 'byed 
59b4(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin// drang srong chen po'i kun mkhyen spyan gyis ni// rigs khams sbrang rtsi dang 'dra 'di gzigs nas// de yi sgrib pa spang ma dang 'dra ba// gtan nas rab tu spong bar mdzad pa yin// ji ltar sbrang rtsi srog chags bye/ 
59b5(mdo 'grel): ba khrag khrig stong bsgribs sbrang kyi don gnyer mas// sbrang mde dag bsal te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbrang rtsi'i bya byed pa// de bzhin lus can la yod zag pa med pa'i shes pa spang ma'i rtsi dang 'dra// nyon mongs spang ma dnga'adra/ 
59b6(mdo 'grel): de 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rgyal ba skyes bu bzhin// ji ltar spun dang 'bru yi snying po ni// mi rnams kyi ni spyad byar mi 'gyur ba// zas sogs don du gnyer ba gang yin pa// de dag gis ni spun nas de 'byir ltar// 
59b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sems can la yod nyon mongs kyi// dri ma dang 'dres rgyal ba'ang ji srid du// nyon mongs dri ma 'dres la ma grol ba// de srid rgyal mdzad srid gsum du mi byed// ji ltar sa lu bra 'o nas 'bru'i snying po spun las ma 
59b8(mdo 'grel): zung gram can// legs par ma bsgrubs snying po mi rnams kyi ni spyad bya bza' ba nim por mi 'byur ltar// de bzhin sems can la yod chos kyi dbang phyuganyen mongs spun las mgrol lus// nyon mongs blabs nyen pa'i 
60a1(mdo 'grel): 'grol tshes kyi dga' ba'i ro ster 'gyur ba pid// ji ltar rab tu rgyu tshe mi yi gser// ldan ljin rul pa'i gnas su lhung gyur la// mi 'jigs chos can de ni der de bzhin// lo brgya mang po dag tu gnas pa de/ 
60a2(mdo 'grel): lha mig rnam dag dang ldan lha yi da// mthong nas mi la 'di na yod pa'i gser// rin chen mchog 'di spangs te rin chen gyis// sgrub par bya ba gyis zhes smra ba ltar// de bzhin thub pas mi gtsang dang 'dra yi// nyon/ 
60a3(mdo 'grel): mongs su bying sems can yon tan ni// gzigs nas nyon mongs 'dam de dag bya'i phyir// skye dgu rnams la dam chos chu char 'bebs// ji ltar ldan ljin rul pa'i gnas su lhung ba'i gser ni lha yis mthong// 
60a4(mdo 'grel): gyur nas// kun tu dag par bya phyir mchog tu mdzes pas mi lanan gyis ston pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyon mongs mi gtsang chen por lhung gyur rdzogs sangs rin po che// sems can rnams la gzigs nas de dag 
60a5(mdo 'grel): bya phyir lus can rnams la chos ston to// ji ltar mi dbul khyim nang sa 'og nas// mi zad pa yi gter ni yod gyur la// mi des de ma shes shing gter de yang // de la nga 'dir yod ces mi smra ltar// de bzhin yid kyi/ 
60a6(mdo 'grel): nang chud rin chen gter// dri med bzhag dang bsal med chos nyid kyang // ma rtogs pas na dbul ba'o sdug bsngal ni// rnam par rgyun tu skye dgu 'dis myod // ji ltar dbul po'i khyim nang du ni rin chen gter chud gyur 
60a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i me la ni// din chen gter bdag yod ces brjod par mi byed de ni mi yis shis min ltar// de bzhin ches gter yid kyi khyim gnas sems can dag ni dbul po lta bu ste// de dag rnams kyis de thob bya phyir 'jig rten du ni 
60a8(mdo 'grel): grang srong yang dag bltams// ji ltar a mra la sogs shing 'bras la// yod pa'i sa bon myu gu 'jig med chos// sarmo sa chu sogs ldan las ljon shing gi/ rgyal po'i dngos po rim gyis 'grub pa ltar// sems can 
60b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ma rig sogs 'bras kyi// pags sbubs nang chud chos khams dge ba yang // de bzhin dge ba de de la brter nas// rim gyis thub pa'i rgyal po'i dngos por 'gyur// chu dang nyi ma'i 'od dang rlung dang sa dus nam 
60b2(mdo 'grel): mkha'i rkyen rnams kyi// ta la dang ni a mra'i 'bras sbubs gseb nas shed skye ji lta bar// sems can nyon mongs 'bras lpags nang chud rdzogs sangs sa bon myu gu yang // de bzhin dge rkyen de dang de las chos 'thon 'phen/ 
60b3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar rin chen las byas rgyal ba'i gzugs// gos hrul dri ngan gyis ni gtums gyur pa// lam gnas lha yis mthong nas grol bya'i phyir// lam gnas don de de la smra ba ltar// de bzhin thob/ 
60b4(mdo 'grel): med rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs kyis gtums bde gshegs dngos po nyid// dud 'gro la yang gzigs nas de bzhin de// zad par bya'i don du thabs ston mdzad// ji ltar rin chen rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs 
60b5(mdo 'grel): sku dri ngan gos gtums pa// lam gnas lha yis mig gis mthong nas mthar phyin mi la ston pa ltar de bzhin// nyon mongs gos hral gyis gtums 'khor ba'i lam na gnas pa'i khams// dud 'gro la yang gzigs 
60b6(mdo 'grel): nas thar par bya phyir rgyal bas tshes ston to// de ltar mi mo gzugs ngan mgon med 'ga'// mgon med 'dug gnas su ni 'dug gyur la// mdal gyis rgyal po'i dpal ni 'dzin byed pas// dang lto na yod mi bdag mi 
60b7(mdo 'grel): shes ltar// srid par skye ba mgon med khyim bzhin te// ma dag sems can mngal ldan bud med bzhin// de la gang zhig yod pas mgon bcas pa// dri med 'ams ni de yi mang la gnas bzhin// ji ltar bud med lus ladri 
60b8(mdo 'grel): bcas gos gon mi sdug gzugs ldan pa// sa bdag mngalan gnas kyang mgon med khang par sdug bsngal mchog kyong ltar// de bzhin bdag dang nang gnas mgod yod gyur kyang mgon med blo ldan pa// 'gro ba nyon mongs 
61a1(mdo 'grel): dbang gis yi dam zhi ba sdug bsngal gzhi la gnas// ji ltar nang gi gser zhun gzugs rgyas pa// zhi ba phyi rol sa yi rang bzhin can mthong nas// de shes pa dag nang gi gser// sbyangs phyir phyi rol sgrib 
61a2(mdo 'grel): pa sel byed ltar// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma rnams kyang ni// glo bur bar ni rnam par gzigs gyur nas// rin chen 'byung gnas lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams// sgrib pa dag las spyod mdzad byang chub mchog/ ji ltar dri med/ 
61a3(mdo 'grel): gser 'bar las byas sa yi nang du chud gyur gzugs// zhi de rang bzhin mkhas pas rig nas sa dag sel bar byed pa ltar// de bzhin kun mkhyen dag pa'i gser 'dra zhi ba'i yid ni mkhyen gyur nas// tshes 'char tshul gyi/ 
61a4(mdo 'grel): rdegs spyad sgrub pas sgrib pa dag ni sel ba mdzad// pad+ma srog chags bur ba dang // sbun pa dang ni mi gtsangs// 'bras shun gos hrul bud med kyi// mdal dang sa yi sbubs na yang // sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po 
61a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin// gser bzhin gter bzhin ljon pa bzhin// rin chen sku dang 'khor lo yi// sgrub bzhin dang gser gzugs bzhin// sems can khams kyi nyon mongs sbubs// ma 'brel thog ma med pa na// sems kyi rang 
61a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin dri med ni// thog ma med pa yin par rjod// chags dang sdang dang rmongs dang de'i// kun ljang drag dang bag chags dang // mthong sgom lam spangs ma dag dang // dag pa'i sa la brten pa yi// dri ma rnam dgu pad+ma yi// 
61a7(mdo 'grel): sbubs sogs dpes ni rab bstan te// nye ba'i nyon mongs sbubs kyi ni// dbye bas bya ba mtha' las 'das// chags sogs nyon mongs dgu po 'di// mdor bsdus nas ni go rim bzhin// pad+ma'i sbubs la sogs pa/ 
61a8(mdo 'grel): ye// dpe dgu dag gis yang dag bstan// dri 'di dag gis byis rnams dang // dgra bcom slob dang blo ldan rnams// rim bzhin bzhi dang gcig dang ni// gnyis dang gnyis kyi ma dag nyid// ji ltar pad+ma 'dam skyes de/ 
61b1(mdo 'grel): mdun du gyur na yid dga' dang // phyi nas dga' ba med gyur na// 'dod chags dga' ba de bzhin no// ji ltar srog chags sbrang ma ni// shin tu 'khrugs te mdun sdig ltar// de bzhin zhe sdang skye ba na// snying la sdug bsngal 
61b2(mdo 'grel): skyed par byed// ji ltar 'bras sogs snying po ni// phyi rol spun pas bsgribs pa ltar// de bzhin snying po'i don mthong ba// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs kyis bsgribs// ji ltar mi gtsang mi mthun pa// de bzhin chags dang / 
61b3(mdo 'grel): bcas rnams kyi// 'dod pa bsten pa'i rgyu yin phyir// kun nas sdang ba mi gtsang 'dra// ji ltar nor ni bsgribs pas na// mi shes gter ni mi 'thob ltar// de bzhin skye la rang byung nyid// ma rig bag chags sa 
61b4(mdo 'grel): yis bsgribs// ji ltar myug sogs rim skyes pas// sa bon shun pa gcod pa ltar// de bzhin de nyid mthong ba yis// mthong spangs rnams ni ldog par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i lam dang 'brel ba las// 'jig 
61b5(mdo 'grel): tshogs snying po bcom rnams kyi// sgom lam ye shes spangs bya rnams// gos rdul dag dang mtshungs par bstan// sa bdun la brten dri ma ni// mar la sbubs dri ma dag dang mtshungs// mngal sbubs bral 'dra 
61b6(mdo 'grel): mi rtogs pa'i// ye shes rnam par smin pa bzhin// sa gsum rjes 'brel dri ma rnams// sa 'ad mgos bzhin shes bya ste// bdag nyid chen po rdo rje lha'i// ting nge 'dzin gyi gzhom bya yin// de ltar chags sogs 
61b7(mdo 'grel): dri ma dgu// pad+ma la sogs dag dang mtshungs// rang bzhin gsum gyis bsdus phyir khams// sangs rgyas sogs dang chos mtshungs so// 'di yi rang bzhin chos sku dang // de bzhin nyid dang rigs kyang ste// de ni/ 
61b8(mdo 'grel): dpe gsum gcig dang ni// lnga rnams kyis ni shes par bya// chos sku rnam gnyis shes bya ste// chos dbyings shin tu dri med dang // de yi rgyu mthun zab pa dang // sna tshogs tshul ni ston pa'o// 'jig rten 'das 
62a1(mdo 'grel): phyir 'jig rten na// 'di la dpe ni mi dmigs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang khams// 'dra ba nyid du bstan pa yin// phra mo zab mo'i tshul bstan ni// sbrang rtsi ro gcig pa bzhin te// rnam pa sna// 
62a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs tshul bstan ni// sna tshogs sbubs snying bzhin shes bya// rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang // dge dang rnam par dag pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid ni 'di gser gyi// gzugs dang mtshungs par brjod pa yin// 
62a3(mdo 'grel): gter dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin du// rigs de rnam gnyis shes bya ste// thog med rang bzhin gnas pa dang // yang dag blangs pa mchog nyid do// rigs 'di gnyis la sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsum thob par 
62a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa yin// dang pos sku ni dang po ste// gnyis pa yis ni phyi ma gnyis// ngo bo nyid sku mdzes pa ni// rin chen sku 'drar shes bya ste// rang bzhin gyis ni byas min dang // yon tan rin chen gter yin phyir// 
62a5(mdo 'grel): chos chen rgyal srid tshe ldan phyir// rdzogs longs 'khor los sgyur bzhin no// gzugs brnyan gyis ni rang bzhin phyir// sbrel pa ga ser gyi gzugs lta bu// rang byar rnams kyi don dam ste// dad pa nyid kyis rtogs 
62a6(mdo 'grel): bya ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba// mig med pas ni mthong ba med// 'di la gsal bya ci yang med// bzhag par bya ba cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// 
62a7(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can// glo bur dag gis khams stong gi/ rnam dbye med pa'i mtshan nyid can// bla med chos kyis stong ma yin// sprin dang rmi lam sku bzhin de dang der// shes bya thams cad rnams 
62a8(mdo 'grel): kun stong pa zhes// gsungs nas yang 'di rgyal rnams sems can la// sangs rgyas snying po yod ces cis te gsungs// sems num sems can dman la brnyas pa dang // yang dag min 'dzin yang dag chos 
62b1(mdo 'grel): la skur// bag chags lhag pa'i skyor lnga gang dag la// yod pa de dag de spong don du gsungs// yang dag mtha' ni 'dus byas kyi// rnam pa thams cad dben pa ste// nyon mongs las dang rnam smin don// sprin la sogs/ 
62b2(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du brjod// nyon mongs sprin 'dra bya ba yin// las ni rmi lam longs spyod bzhin// nyon mongs las kyi rnam par smin// phung po sgyu ma sprul pa bzhin// sngar ni de ltar rnam bzhag nas// slar yang bla ma'i/ 
62b3(mdo 'grel): rgyud 'dir ni// nyes pa lnga dag spang ba'i phyir// khams yod nyid ces bstan pa yin// 'di ltar de ni ma thos pas// bdag la brnyas pa'i nyes pa yis// sems ni zhum pa 'ga' zhig la// byang chub sems ni skye 
62b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur// gang la byang chub sems skyes pas// bdag ni mchog ces rlom pa na// byang chub sems ma skyes pa la// dman pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/ de ltar sems pa de la ni// yang dag shes pa mi skye ba// 
62b5(mdo 'grel): des na yang dag mi 'dzin zhing // yang dag don ni rigs mi 'gyur// bcos ma glo bur ba nyid phyir// sems can skyon de yang dag min// yang dag nyes de bdag med pa// yon tan rang bzhin dag pa yin// yang dag min 
62b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nyes 'dzin zhing // yang dag yon tan skur 'debs pas// blo ldan padag dang sems can ni// mtshungs mthong byams pa thob mi 'gyur// 'di las de ni thos pa las// spyod dang ston pa bzhin gu sa dang // shes 
62b7(mdo 'grel): rab ye shes byams chen skye// chos lnga skyes phyir de las ni// kha na ma tho med mtshur sa lta// skyon med yon tan ldan pa dang // bdag dang sems can mtshungs bya ste// sangs rgyas nyid ni myur du thob// theg pa chen po 
62b8(mdo 'grel): zla tham bas sa// gnams nas par la/ deg na gags pa ni pa gams pag/ gas thal dang sa// gnas sa che// bag 
63a1(mdo 'grel): de yang ni// ji srid dus dang ji lta nyid// ngo bo rgyu dang 'bras bu dang // las dang ldan dang 'jug pa dang // de rtag bsam mi khyab nyid kyis// sangs rgyas sa ni rnam par gnas// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes/ 
63a2(mdo 'grel): chos la mi rtog rnam 'byed ye shes dag la brten nas 'thob// sangs rgyas nyid ni dbyer med pa// dag pa'i chos kyis rab phye ba// nyi mkha' bzhin te ye shes dang // spangs pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// 'od gsal 
63a3(mdo 'grel): byas min dbyed med par// 'jug can ng+gA'i klung gi ni// rdul las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas // chas rnams kun dang ldan pa nyid// rang bzhin gyis ni mthu dang // byab dang blo byung banyid kyis// nan mangs shes d+ha'i 
63a4(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa der// sprin dang 'dra bar brjod pa yin// sgrib pa gnyis dang bral ba yi// d+hu ni ye shes gnyis yin te// mi rtogs pa dang da yi ni// rjes thob de ni ye shes 'dod// dri med chu ldan rim rgyas pad+mas khebs pa'i 
63a5(mdo 'grel): mtsho bzhin dang // skrag can kha nas thar pa'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang // sprin tshogs nyon mongs dag las grol ba'i nyi ma lta bur ni// dri med yon tan ldan phyir 'od zer snang ldan de nyid// thub pa khyu mchog sbrang rtsi snying po dang / 
63a6(mdo 'grel): rin chen gser dang gter dang ljon shing bzhin// dri med rin chen bde gshegs sku dang ni// sa bdag gser gyi gzugs 'dra rgyal ba nyid// chu mtsho sogs bzhin 'dod chags sogs// glo bur nyon mongs dag pa ni// 
63a7(mdo 'grel): mdor na mi rtog ye shes kyi// 'bras bu yin par rab tu brjod// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas sku ni des thob pa// ye shes 'bras bu yin par bshad// 'dod chags rdul ni spangs phyir dang // gdul bya 
63b1(mdo 'grel): yi ni pad+ma la// bsam gtan chu ni 'bab phyir dang // chu dag rdzing dang mtshungs pa yin// zhe sdang skra gcan las grol bas// snying rje byams chen 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba khyab pa'i phyir na de// dri med zla ba nya ba bzhin// 
63b2(mdo 'grel): gti mug sprin las rnam grol bas// 'gro bar ye shes 'od zer gyis// mun pa sel gyir sangs rgyas nyid// de ni dri med nyi ma bzhin// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i chos phyir dang // dam tshesar ni sbyin mdzad dang // shan 
63b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni bral phyir de// bde gshegs sbrang rtsi snying po bzhin// gang phyir yon tan rdzas kyi ni// dbul ba sel bar byed phyir dang // rnam grol 'bras bu smin byed phyir// gser dang gter dang ljon shing bzhin// rin 
63b4(mdo 'grel): chen chos kyi sku phyir dang // rkang gnyis bdag po phyogs phyir dang // rin chen gzugs kyi rnam pa'i phyir// de ni rin chen rgyal gser bzhin// zag pa med khyab 'jig med chos can te// brtan zhing brtag pa 'pho med 
63b5(mdo 'grel): gnas yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' bzhin dam pa yi// dbang po drug don nyams su myong ba'i rgyu// 'byung med gzugs don lta dang gtam bzang ni// gtsang mnyan dang bde gshegs tshul khrims kyi// dri gtsang 
63b6(mdo 'grel): snom dang 'phags chen dam chos ro// myong dang ting 'dzin reg bde nyams kyang dang // rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi za ba'i tshul// rtog pa'i nur gyur zhim mor bsams pas na// don dam pa mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ni// nam 
63b7(mdo 'grel): mkha' bzhin du rgyu mtshan rnams dang bral// mdor na ye shes gnyis po yi// las su 'di ni shes bya ste// grol ba'i sku ni rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi sku ni sbyor ba'o// rnam grol chos kyi sku dag ni// rnam gnyis 
63b8(mdo 'grel): rnam gcig shes bya ste// zag pa med phyir khyab pa'i phyir// 'dus ma byas kyi gnas nyid phyir// nyon mongs rnams ni bag chags dang // bcas pa 'gags phyir zag med de// chags med thogs pa med pa'i phyir// 
64a1(mdo 'grel): ye shes khyab pa nyid du 'dod// gtan du 'jig pa med pa yi// rang bzhin yin phyir 'dus ma byas// 'jig med nyid ni bstan pa ste// bstan sogs rnams kyis de bshad do// 'jigs pa rnam bzhir shes/ 
64a2(mdo 'grel): bya ste// bstan sogs dag las bzlog phyir ro// myags dang rnam 'gyur chad pa dang // bsam mi khyab sbyar 'pho ba ste// de med phyir na brtan zhi dang // rtag dang 'pho med shes par bya// dri med shes te dkar po yi// 
64a3(mdo 'grel): chos kyi rten yin phyir na gnas// ji ltar rgyu min nam mkha' ni// gzugs mthong ba dang sgra dang dri// ro dang rig dang chos rnams ni// thos la sogs pa'i rgyu yin ltar// de bzhin sku gnyis sgrib med pa'i// sbyor bas// 
64a4(mdo 'grel): brtan pa'i dbang don la// zag pa med pa'i yon tan dag/ skye ba yi rgyu yin no// bsam med rtag pa brtan zhing g.yung drung nyid// rab tu ni khyab rtog bral nam mkha' bzhin// chags med kun tu thogs med rtsub reg spangs// / 
64a5(mdo 'grel): blta bzung med dag sangs rgyas dri ma med// rnam grol chos kyi sku dag gis// rang dang gzhan gyis don rten de la ni// bsam mi khyab sogs yon tan ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul// sangs rgyas shes 
64a6(mdo 'grel): gsum yul min phyir// ye shes lus can rnams kyis ni// bsam mi khyab par rtogs par bya// phra phyir thos pa'i yul min te// don dam yin gyi rabasam bya'i min// chos nyid zab phyir 'jig rten pa'i// sgom pa 
64a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs yul ma yin// gang phyir gzugs la dmus long bzhin// byis pas de sngon mthong ma myong // gtsas pa'i khyim gnas bu chung gis// nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin 'phags pas kyang // skye dang bral phyir rtag pa ste// 
64a8(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa med phyir brtan pa yin// gnyis med phyir de zhi ba ste// g.yung drung chos nyid gnas phyir ro// rab ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i phyir// thams cad rtogs phyir khyab pa nyid// gnas pa med phyir rtogs med de// nyon mongs 
64b1(mdo 'grel): spongs phyir chags pa med// shes bya'i sgrib kun dag pa'i phyir// thams cad du ni thogs pa med// gnyis med las su rung ba'i phyir// rtsub pa'i reg dang bral ba yin// de gzugs med phyir bltar med de// mtshan / 
64b2(mdo 'grel): ma med phyir bzung du med// dge ba rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// dri med dri ma spangs phyir ro// thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyer med// gnyis med gsum bral dri med rnam rtog med// chos dbyings rang bzhin gang 
64b3(mdo 'grel): yin de rtogs pa// mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis mthong // gzhal med gang ga'i bye ma las 'das pa// bsam med mnyam med yon tan rnams dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri med dbyings
64b4(mdo 'grel): de ni// bag chags bcas pa'i nyes pa rnams spangs pa'o// sna tshogs dam chos 'od zer mnga' ba'i skus// 'gro ba'i rnam grol don grub la brtson pa// mdzad pa yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal bzhin te// sna tshogs 
64b5(mdo 'grel): dngos dang de yi rang bzhin min// 'jig rten zhi ba'i lam la 'jug pa dang // rab tu smin dang lung ston rgyu yi gzugs// gang yin de yang 'dir ni rtag gnas te// nam mkha'i khams su gzugs kyi khams bzhin no// 
64b6(mdo 'grel): rang 'byung rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas nyid ces gang brjod pa// mchog tu mya ngan 'das bsam med// dgra bcom so so'i bdag gyur pa// de dbye zab dang rgya che dang // bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi// 
64b7(mdo 'grel): chos kyis rab kyi rang bzhin la// sogs pa'i sku gsum dag gis 'jug/ de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ngo bo nyid sku mtshan nyid lnga// mdor na yon tan lnga dang ni// ldan pa nyid du rig par bya// 'dus mabyas shi 
64b8(mdo 'grel): rnam dbyer med// mtha' gnyis dag ni rnam par spangs// nyon mongs shes bya snyoms 'jug gi/ sgrib gsum las ni nges grol ke/ dri med rnam par rtog med dang // rnal 'byor rnams kyi yul yin phyir// chos 
65a1(mdo 'grel): dbyings ngo bo nyid kyis ni// dag pa'i phyir na 'od gsal ba// gzhal med grangs med bsam med pa// mnyam med dag pa'i mthar thug pa// yon tan rnams dang yang dag par// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ldan te// 
65a2(mdo 'grel): rgya che'i phyir dang grangs med phyir// rtog ge'i yul ni min phyir dang // 'ba' zhig bag chags bcas spangs phyir// gzhal med la sogs go rim bzhin// sna tshogs chos la rdzogs longs spyod// rang bzhin chos 
65a3(mdo 'grel): ni snang phyir dang // thugs rje dag pa'i rgyu 'thun pa// 'gro don rgyun mi 'chad phyir dang // rnam par rtog med lhan grub par// 'dod pa ji bzhin yongs skong phyir// yid bzhin nor bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// rdzogs pa'i 
65a4(mdo 'grel): longs spyod rnam par gnas// brjod ston mdzad rgyun mi 'chad dang // mngon par 'du byed med pa dang // de yi ngo bor min ston pa// 'dir ni sna tshogs rnam lngar brjod// ji ltar tshon ni sna tshogs kyis// nor bu de dngos 
65a5(mdo 'grel): min snang ltar// de bzhin 'gro rkyen sna tshogs pas// khyab bdag de dngos min par snang // thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten mkhyen// 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par// sprul pa'i 
65a6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis// skye ba mngon par skye ba dang // dga' ldan nas ni 'pho ba dang // lhums su 'jug dang bltams pa dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang // btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol la dang // nges
65a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung dka' ba spyod pa dang // byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang // bdud ste 'joms dang rdzogs par ni// byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo dang // mya ngan 'das par gshegs mdzad rnams// yongs su ma dag zhing rnams
65a8(mdo 'grel): su// srid pa ji srid gnas par ston// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang // zhi ba'i sgra yis thabs mkhyen pa// sems can srid gsum skyo bskyed nas// mya ngan 'das la rab 'jug mdzad// zhi ba'i lam la 
65b1(mdo 'grel): rab zhugs pa// mya ngan 'das thob 'du shes can// dam chos pad+ma dkar la sogs// chos kyi de nyid bstan pa yis// de dag sngar 'dzin las bzlog ste// thabs dang shes rab yongs bzung bas// theg pa mchog 
65b2(mdo 'grel): la smin mdzad de// byang chub mchog tu lung ston to// zab dang mthu ni phun tshegs dang // byis pa'i don mthun rab 'dren phyir// 'di dag grangs bzhin zab pa dang // rgya che'i bdag nyid shes par bya// 'dir ni dang po chos 
65b3(mdo 'grel): su ste// phyi ma dag ni gzugs kyi sku// nam mkha' la ni gzugs gnas bzhin// dang po la ni tha ma gnas// sku mtha' yas dang sems can zad med dang // brtse dang 'phrul dang mkhyen dang phun tshogs ldan// chos kyi 
65b4(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug 'chi ba'i bdud bcom dang // ngo bo med phyir 'jig rten mgon po rtag/ lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams// btang nas dam chos sbe gyi dang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// dang po'i dam bca' mthar
65b5(mdo 'grel): 'byin byed// sangs rgyas nyid la gtsang ba dang // dag pa'i thugs rje rab 'jug phyir// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ston pa ni// de yis gnas par spyod pa'i phyir// mkhyen pas 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis su 'dzin las 
65b6(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i phyir// rtag tu bsam yas ting 'dzin gyi// bde ba phun sum tshogs ldan phyir// 'jig rtenan ni spyod pa na// 'jig rten chos kyi sa gos med phyir// 'chi med zhi ba'i gnas thob la// 'chi bdud chub med pa'i 
65b7(mdo 'grel): byir// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// thub pa gdod nas rang ni'i phyir// rtag pa skyabs med rnams kyi ni// skyabs la sogs par 'thad phyir ro// dang po yi ni rgyu bdun gyis// gzugs kyi sku ni rtag nyid 
65b8(mdo 'grel): de// phye ma gsum gyi ston pa ni// chos kyi sku yis rtag pa nyid// dag yul min phyir don dam gyis bsdus phyir// rtog gnas min phyir dpe las 'das pa'i phyir// bla na med phyir srid zhis ma bsdus phyir// 
66a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal yul 'phags rnams kyis kyang bsam mi khyab// bsam med brjod du med phyir de// brjod med don dam yin phyir ro// don dam rtag bya min phyir te// brtag min rjes dpag bya min phyir// dpag med/ 
66a2(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa'i phyir// bla na med pa ma bsdus phyir// ma bsdus gnas pa med phyir de// yon tan skyon rtog med phyir ro// rgyu lnga dag gis phra ba'i phyir// chos sku bsam mi khyab pa ste// drug pas de yi dngos min 
66a3(mdo 'grel): phyir// gzugs skubasam mi khyab pa'o// bla med ye shes thugs rje che sogs yon tan gyi// yon tan pha rol byon pa'i rgyal ba bsam mi khyab// des na rang byung rnams kyi tha ma'i tshul 'di ni// drang srong chen po dbang thob/ 
66a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis kyang rig min// theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos dkon mchog gi rigs rnam par dbye ba las// byang chub kyis skabs te gnyis pa'o// // rang don gzhan don don dam sku dang ni// de la brten pa'i kun 
66a5(mdo 'grel): rdzob sku nyid de// bral dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni// yon tan dbye ba drug cu bzhi 'di dag/ bdag nyid kyis ni sbyor ba'i gnas// dam pa'i don gyi sku yin te// drang srong rnams kyi brda yi sku// pha rol phun sum tshogs 
66a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas// dang po'i sku ni stobs la sogs// bral ba'i yon tan rnams dang ldan// gnyis pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan// rnam smin yon tan dag dang ldan// stobs nyid ma rig sgrib la rdo rje bzhin// mi 'jigs 
66a7(mdo 'grel): nyid ni 'khor du seng+ge bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres mkha' bzhin te// thub pa'i bstan pa rnam gnyis chu zla bzhin// gnas dang gnas min las rnams kyi// rnam smin dang ni dbang po dang // khams rnams 
66a8(mdo 'grel): dang ni mos pa dang // kun 'gro'i lam dang bsam gtan sogs// nyon mongs dri ma med pa dang // gnas ni rjes su dran pa dang // lha yi mig dang zhi bdag/ mkhyen pa'i stobs ni rnam pa bcu// gnas dang gnas min/ 
66b1(mdo 'grel): rnam smin khams dang 'gro ba'i mos pa sna tshogs dang // nyon mongs rnam byang dbang po'i tshogs dang sngon gnas rjes su dran pa dang // lha yi mig dang zag pa zad tshul mi shes go cha rtseg brtan dang / shed rnams 'bigs 
66b2(mdo 'grel): dang gzhig dang gcod phyir stobs gang yin pa rdo rje bzhin// chos kun rdzogs par byang chub dang // gegs ni 'gog par bya ba dang // lam sten pa dang 'gog ston la// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// bdag gzhan shes bya'i// 
66b3(mdo 'grel): dngos po rnam kun shes dang shes mdzad phyir// spang dngos spong dang spong mdzad phyir dang brten bya brten pa'i phyir// theb bya bla med shin tu dri med thob dang thob mdzad phyir// rang gzhan don bden gsung phyir drang srong gang du'ang thogs/ 
66b4(mdo 'grel): pa med// ri dgas dbang po ji ltar nags mthar rtags 'jigs med// ri dgas rnams la skrag pa med par rgyu ba ltar// de bzhin tshogs na thub pa'i dbang po seng ge yang // legs gnas ltos med brtan pa'i rtsal dang 
66b5(mdo 'grel): ldan par gnas// 'khrul dang ca co mi mnga' ste// ston la dran pa nyams mi mnga'// mnyam par ma bzhag thugs mi mnga'// 'du shes sna tshogs kyang mi mnga'// ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste// 'dun pa/ 
66b6(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus dran pa dang // shes rab rnam grol rnam grol gyi// ye shes gzigs pa nyams mi mnga'// las rnams ye shes sngon 'gro dang // dus la ye shes gzigs pa med// de ltar bco brgyad 'di dang gzhan// 
66b7(mdo 'grel): ston pa'i ma 'dres yon tan yin// 'khrul dang ca rtse bsnyil dang thugs g.yo tha dad kyi ni 'du shes dang // rang gis btang snyoms drang srong la med 'dun pa dang ni brtson 'grus dang // dran dang rnam dag dri med shes rab rtag tu 
66b8(mdo 'grel): rnam par grol ba dang // shes bya'i don kun gzigs pa grol ba'i ye shes las ni nyams mi mnga'// gang gi las gsum thams cad ye shes sngon 'gro rjes su 'jug pa dang // dus gsum rtag tu thogs med nges par 
67a1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa rgya chen 'jug pa ste// gang rtogs 'gro bar 'jig med dam chos 'khor lo chen po rab bskor ba// mthu rje chen po dang ldan rgyal ba nyid des sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes// sa sogs la yod chos ga 
67a2(mdo 'grel): tsam yang 'jig rten dag na thun mong min// legs gnas 'khor los mtshan pa dang // yangs dang zhabs longs mi mngon dang // sor mo ring dang phyag zhabs ni// dra ba yis ni 'brel ba dang // pags 'jam gzhon sha 
67a3(mdo 'grel): can legs nyid// sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang // byin pa e Ne ya 'dragasang // glang po bzhin du sbubs su nub// re snod seng ge 'dra ba dang // thal gong bar med rgyas pa dang // dpung mgo legs zlu ma phyag 'jam zhing // 
67a4(mdo 'grel): zlum zhing mthon dman med pa dang // phyag ring yongs su dag pa'i sku// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan dang // mgrin pa dri med dung 'dra dang // 'gram pa ri dgas rgyal po 'dra// tshems ni bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang // rab dag choms 
67a5(mdo 'grel): thigs bzang ba dang // rnam dag tshems mnyam nyid dang ni// mche ba rab mchog dkar ba nyid// ljags ring mtha' med bsam med pa// ro bri ba yi mchog nyid dang // rang byung ka la bing ka yi// skra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid 
67a6(mdo 'grel): dang // spyan bzang ut+pal khru mchog rdzi 'dra dang // zhal mdzes dri med mdzod spu dkar ldan pa// gtsug tor dbur ldan dag cing srab pa dang // pags pa gser gyi mdog 'dra sems can mchog/ ba spu legs phra 'arngam zhing re re 
67a7(mdo 'grel): nas// sku yi gyen du g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa dang // dbu skra dri med rin chen mthon mthing bzhin// n+ya gro rdzogs pa'i ljon shing dkyil 'khor 'dra// kun tu bzang po dpe med drang srong che// sred med bu yi stobs mnga' mkhregs 
67b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sku// bsam mi khyab 'bar sum cu rtsa gnyis po// 'di dag ston pas mi dbang mtshan du gsungs// ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i zla ba'i gzugs// ston ka'i chu sngon mtsher ni mthong ba ltar// de bzhin rgyal sras tshogs 
67b2(mdo 'grel): kyis khyab bdag gzugs// rdzogs sangs dkyil 'khor nang du mthong bar 'gyur// yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi po// 'di dag so sor rgyur bcas te// go rim ji bzhin rin chen gyi// mdo yi rjes 'brangs shes par bya// mi phyed 
67b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang mi zhan dang // mtshungs pa med dang g.yo med phyir// rdo rje seng ge mkha' dag pa// chu yi zla ba'i dpes bstan to// stobs sogs rnams las stobs drug dang // gsum dang gcig gis rim pa bzhin// shes 
67b4(mdo 'grel): bya snyoms par 'jug pa dang // bag chags bcas pa kun bsal bas// go cha rtsig pa shing bzhin du// phug dang gzhig dang bcad phyir ro// brling dang snying brtan mi byed pas// drang srong stobs ni rdo rje 'dra// gang phyir/ 
67b5(mdo 'grel): brlid pa snying po'i phyir// gang phyir snying po brtan pa'i phyir// gang phyir brtan pa mi phyed phyir// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje bzhin// 'jig med phyir dang ltos med phyir// brtan phyir rtsa la ni phun chags pas// thub pas/ 
67b6(mdo 'grel): seng ge seng ge bzhin// 'khor gyi tshogs su 'jigs mi mnga'// kun mngon mkhyen pas gang las kyang // 'jigs med par ni rnam par gnas// dag pa'i sems can dang yang bdag/ mi mnyam gzigs kyir 
67b7(mdo 'grel): ltos pa med// thugs ni chos rnams thams cad la// rtse gcig phyir na brtan pa nyid// mchog tu ma rig bag chags kyi// sa las brgal phyir rtsal ldan no// 'jig rten nyan thos mtha' gcig tu// spyod dang blo 
67b8(mdo 'grel): ldan rang byung rnams// gong nas gong du blo dag ni// phra phyir dpe ni rnam pa lnga// 'jig rten kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i phyir// sa chu me rlung rnams dang mtshungs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis// mtshan nyid las 'das/ 
68a1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin// de dag yon tan sum cu ni// gnyis 'di chos skus rab bye ste// nor bu rin chen 'ad mdog dang // dbyibs bzhin dbye ba med phyir ro// mthong na tshim byed yon tan gang // sum cu rtsa/ 
68a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis zhes bya ba sprul pa chos la rdzogs par ni// longs spyod rdzogs sku gnyis la brten// dag las nye dang ring rnams la// 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// chu dang nam mkhar zla gzugs bzhin// de mthong/ 
68a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni rnam pa gnyis// theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos// dkon mchog gi rigs rnam par dbye ba las// yon tan gyi skabs te gsum pa'o// / gdul bya'i khams dang gdul ba'i thabs dang ni// gdul 
68a4(mdo 'grel): bya'i khams kyi gdul ba'i bya ba dang // de yi yul dang dus su gshegs pa la// khyab bdag rtag tu lhun gyis grub par 'jug/ yon tan rin chen mchog tshogs dang ldan ye shes chu mtsho bsod nams ye shes nyi 'od can/ 
68a5(mdo 'grel): theg pa ma lus nges par bsgrubs te mtha' dang dpung med rgya chen nam mkha' ltar khyab pa// sangs rgyas nyid ni yon tan dri ma med gter sems can kun la khyab med rnam gzigs nas// nyon mongs shes bya'i sprin gyi dra ba/ 
68a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i rlung gis rnam par gtor// gang gis gang gis gdul ba yi// bya gang gang du gang gi tshe// de yi rnam rtog skye med byer// thub pa rtag tu ldan gyis grub// gdul bya'i khams ni gang shig 
68a7(mdo 'grel): gis// gdul bya'i thabs mang gang gang gis// gdul bya'i bya gang gang du ni// gang tshe'i yul dang dus de dag/ nges 'byin de yi rton pa dang // des 'bras de yi yongs 'dzin dang // de'i sgrib de gcod rkyen la ni// rnam 
68a8(mdo 'grel): par rtog pa med phyir ro// nges par 'byin pas bcu ste// tshogs gnyis dag ni de yi rgyu// de 'bras byang chub mchog yin te// byang chub sems can yongs su 'dzin// de'i sgrib mtha' yas nyon mongs dang // nye ba'i// / 
68b1(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs bag chags so// dus kun tu ni de 'joms pa'i// rkyen ni thugs rje chen po yin// gnas drug po ni 'di dag rnams// go rim ji bzhin rgya mtsho dang // nyi ma dang ni nam mkha' gter// sprin dang rlung bzhin shes 
68b2(mdo 'grel): bar bya// shes chu yon tan rin chen dang // ldan phyir sa rnams rgya mtsho bzhin// sems can thams cad nyer 'tsho'i phyir// tshogs gnyis dag ni nyi ma bzhin// rgya che mtha' dang dbus med phyir// byang chub nam mkha 
68b3(mdo 'grel): khams bzhin no// yang dag rdzogs sangs chos nyid phyir// sems can khams ni gter dang 'dra// glo bur khyab dang ma grub phyir// de yi nyon mongs sprin tshogs bzhin// de 'thor ba ni nyer gnas phyir// thugs rje mi zad
68b4(mdo 'grel): rlung dang 'dra// gzhan gyi dbang gis nges 'byung dang // bdag dang sems can mtshungs gzigs dang // mdzad pa yongs su ma rdzogs phyir// 'khor ba srid du mdzad mi 'chad// brgya byin lnga sprin tshangs pa dang // nyi ma nor 
68b5(mdo 'grel): pu rin chen bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra brnyan bzhin// nam mkha' dang ni sa bzhin no// ji ltar bai nur dag pa yi// rang bzhin sa steng 'di gyur te// dag phyir lha yi dbang po de// lha yi bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas 
68b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang dang // lAg nas de las gzhan dag dang // de yi gzhal yas sna tshogs dang // lha rdzas rnams mang de mthong ngo // de nas skyes pa bud med tshogs// sa yi steng na gnas pa rnams// 
68b7(mdo 'grel): snang ba de ni mthong gyur te// nged kyang ring por mi thogs par// lha dbang 'di 'drar gyur cig ces// de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs byed cing // de thab don du dge ba ni// yang dag blangs te gnas par gyur// de dag dge ba'i/ 
68b8(mdo 'grel): las des ni// 'di snang tsam zhes de lta bur// shes pa med kyang sa steng nas// 'phos te lhar ni skye bar 'gyur// snang ba de ni shin tu yang // rtog pa med cing g.yo ba med// de lta med kyi sa steng na// den chen gyis// 
69a1(mdo 'grel): ni nye bar gnas// de bzhin dang sogs dri med can// dad sogs yon tan bsgoms pa yi// rang sems la snang rdzogs sangs rgyas// mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa// 'chags pa dang ni bzhengs 
69a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang // bzhugs pa dang ni gzims pa dang // spyod lam sna tshogs mdzad pa can// zhi ba'i chos ni gsung ba dang // mi gsung mnyam par bzhag gyur pa// tshe 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang // mdzad pa gzi 
69a3(mdo 'grel): mdangs chen po can// sems can rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong nas kyang 'dod ldan pa// sangs rgyas nyid phyir rab sbyor te// de rgyu yang dag blangs nas ni// 'dod pa'i go 'phang thob par byed// snang ba/ 
69a4(mdo 'grel): de ni shin tu yang // rtag med g.yo ba med pa nyid// de lta na yang 'jig rten na// don chen pos ni nye bar gnas// 'di ni rang sems snang ba bzhin// so so'i skye bos mi shes med// de lta na yang gzugs mthong ste// 
69a5(mdo 'grel): de dag la ni dan yad 'gyur// rim gyis de mthor la brten nas// theg pa 'di la gnas pa rnams// nang gi dam pa'i chos spu ni// ye shes mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar sa kun nyams nga'i gnas gzhan 
69a6(mdo 'grel): dang bral dri med bai DUr+ya// gsal mdzes nor bu'i yon tan dri bral dpal ldan steng ni mnyam gyur te// dag phyir der ni lha bdag sna tshogs lha dbang lha yi gzugs shar ste// rim gyis sa yis yon tan bral phyir de/ 
69a7(mdo 'grel): ni slar yang mi snang 'gyur// de dngos thob phyir bsnyen gnas brtul zhugs nges par sbyin sogs la phyogs pa// bud med skyes tshogs smon pa'i sems kyis me tog la sogs 'thor ba ltar// dag pa'i bai DUr+ya 
69a8(mdo 'grel): 'dra'i sems la snang ba'i thub dbang thob bya'i phyir// rab ge sems ldan rgyal ba'i sras rnams de bzhin sems rab skyed par byed// ji ltar bai rdu sa ga ni gtsang ma la// lga dbar lus kyi gzugs brnyan snang sa 
69b1(mdo 'grel): ltar// de bzhin 'gro sems sa gzhi gtsang ba la// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku yi gzugs brnyan 'char// 'gro bar gzugs brnyan 'char nub rnyog med dang // rnyog pa'i rang sems rab 'jug dbang gis 'jug/ ji ltar
69b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dag na gzugs snang ltar// de bzhin yod dngang zhig ces de mi lta// ji ltar lha nang lha rnams kyis// sngon gyi dkar po'i mthu yis ni// 'bad dang gnas dang yid gzugs dang // rnam par rtog pa med/ 
69b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang // zhi ba'i sgra yis bag med pa'i// lha rnams thams cad yang nas yang // chos kyi rdzas ni skul byed ltar// de bzhin khyab bdag 'bad sogs dang // bral yang 'gro/ 
69b4(mdo 'grel): ba ma lus pa// sangs rgyas gsung gis khyab mdzad de// skal ldan rnams la chos ston to// ji ltar lha nang lha rnams kyi// rnga sgra rang gi las las 'byung // de bzhin 'jig rten thub pa'i chos// gsung ba rang gi 
69b5(mdo 'grel): las las 'byung // 'bad na sa lus dang sems bral ba'i// sgra de ji ltar ni sgrub ltar// de bzhin 'bad sogs dang bral ba'i// chos de zhi ba sgrub par byed// ji ltar lha yi grong na rnga sgra'i rgyas byung mi 'jigs sbyin/ 
69b6(mdo 'grel): pa ni// nyon mongs g.yul du 'jug tshe lha min dpung rgyal rtsed mo sel ba bzhini// de bzhin 'jig rten dag na bsam gtan gzugs med la sogs rgyus byung ba// sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal rab 'joms/ 
69b7(mdo 'grel): ni ba bla med lam tshul brjod// gang phyir skye kun pa nyid dang // phan bde cho 'phrul gsum ldan pa// de phyir thub dbyangs lha rdzas kyis// sil snyan rnams las khyad par 'phags// lhar ni rnga yi sgra chen po// sar
69b8(mdo 'grel): gnas rnams kyi rnar mi 'gro// sangs rgyas rnga sgra 'khor ba yis// sa 'og 'jig rten dag tu 'gro// lhar ni lha yi sil snyan bye ba mang // 'dod me mngon par 'phel ba'i don du sgrogs// mthu rje'i bdag nyid rnams 
70a1(mdo 'grel): kyi dbyangs gcig kyang // sdug bsngal me rabazhi pa'i don du 'jug/ lhar ni mdzes shing yid 'ong sil snyan sgra// sems kyi rgod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu// thugs rje'i bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs 
70a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i gsung // ting 'dzin sems gtor bsam pa skul byed nyid// mdor na ma lus 'jig rten rnams su yang // lha dang sa yi bde ba'i rgyu gang yin// de ni ma lus 'jig rten khyab snang la/ dbyangs nyid la ni rab tu 
70a3(mdo 'grel): brten par brjod// ji ltar snang ba dang bral bas// phra mo'i sgra ni mi byor zhing // thams cad lha yi rna bar yang // rna lam du ni mi 'gro zhing // de bzhin tshes phra mchog tu ni// zhib mo'i ye shes spyod yul yang // nyon 
70a4(mdo 'grel): mongs med yid 'ga' zhig gi/ rna lam du ni 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar dbyar gyi dus na sprin// lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// chu yi phung po 'bad med par// sa la rgyun du 'bebs pa ltar// de bzhin mthu rje'i sprin 
70a5(mdo 'grel): las ni// rgyal ba'i dam chos chu yi char// 'gro ba'i dge ba'i lo tog rgyu// rnam par rtog pa med par 'bebs// ji ltar 'jig rten dge ba'i lam 'jug na// rlung skyes chu char sprin gyis 'bebs pa ltar// de bzhin brtse 
70a6(mdo 'grel): rlung 'gro dge mngon 'phel phyir// sangs rgyas sprin las dam chos char 'bebs pa// srid la mkhyen dang brje chen 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ma gos nam mkha'i dkyil gnas pa// ting 'dzin gzungs chu dri med snying 
70a7(mdo 'grel): bai can// thub dbang sprin ni dge ba'i lo tog cu// ji ltar bsil dang zham dang 'jam pa dang // yang ba'i chu ni sprin de las 'then pa// sal batshal sogs gnas 'brel bas// shin tu mang po'i ror ni 'gyur ba bzhin// 
70a8(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad chu'i char// rab yangs brtse sprin snying po las mthon pa// 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi gnas kyi dbye ba las// rnam pa mang po'i ri dang ldan par 'gyur// theg pa mchog la dang ba dang // bar/ 
70b1(mdo 'grel): ma dang ni sdang ba yi// phung po gsum ni mi dag dang // rma bya dang ni yi dgas 'dra// dpyid mthar sprin med pa na mi dang mkha' mi rgyu ba'i bya dag dang // dbyar tshe sa la char 'bab pa na yi dgas dag ni sdug pa ltar// snying rje// 
70b2(mdo 'grel): sprin tshegs dag gis chos chu byung dang ma byung ba las kyang // chos 'dod pa dang tshes la snang ba'i 'jig rten gzhan ni dpe de nyid// thigs pa dgas 'bebs rdo tshan dang ni rdo rje'i me ni 'bebs pas na// srog chags 
70b3(mdo 'grel): phra dang ri sul seng ba dag na ji ltar sprin ltos med// pra dang rgya chen rigs thabs tshul gyis mkhyen pa dang ni brtse ba'i sprin// nyon mongs dag 'gyur ba dag lha'i bag la nyal dag rnam kun ltos pa med// 'khor ba skye 
70b4(mdo 'grel): 'chi thog mtha' med der 'gro ba'i lam ni rnam pa lnga// mi gtsang ba la dri zhim med bzhin 'gre lnga dag na bde ba med// de yi sdug bsngal rtag tu me mtshon rgya chu la sogs reg skyes bzhin// mthu rje'i sprin las dam chos 
70b5(mdo 'grel): char chen de rab zhi byed rab tu 'bebs// lha la 'chi 'pho mi la yongs tsho'i sdug bsngal zhes byar rtogs pa'i phyir// shes rab ldan pa lha mi'i dbang phyug mchog la'ang mngon par 'dod med de// shes rab dang ni de bzhin 
70b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i gsung rab dad pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'di rgyu 'di ni 'gog ces shes pas mthong phyir ro// nad ni shes bya nad kyi rgyu ni spang bya la// bde gnas thob bya sman ni bsten par bya ba ltar// 
70b7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rgyu dang de 'gog pa dang de bzhin lam// shes bya reg par bya zhing brten par bya// ji ltar tshangs pa tshangs pa yi// gnas nas 'pho ba med bzhin du// lha yi gnas ni thams cad du// snang ba 'bad med
70b8(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa ltar// de bzhin thub pa chos sku las// bskyod pa med par khams kun tu// skal ldan rnams la 'bad med par// sprul bdag ni ston par mdzad// ji ltar tshangs rtag gzhal yas lang las migayo 'dod 
71a1(mdo 'grel): khams zhugs pa de// lha rnams kyis mthong de mthong de ni yul la dga' ba spong byed ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku las mi skyod 'jig rten kun tu de// skal ldan gyis mthong de mthong de yang // 
71a2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu dri ma kun sel byed// sngon gyi rang nyid smon lam dang // lha rnams kyi ni dge ba'i mthus// ji ltar tshangs pa 'bad med snang // rang byung sbrul sku de bzhin no// 'pho dang ldums 'jug bltams dang yab kyi khab 
71a3(mdo 'grel): gshegs dang // dgyes rol dang dben par spyod dang bdud bcom dang // byang chub che brnyes zhi ba'i grong khyer lam ston dag/ bstan gnas thub pa skal med mig gi lam mi 'gyur// ji ltar nyi mas gdugs pas dus 
71a4(mdo 'grel): gcig tshe nyid la// pad sogs rgyas dang ku mu da ni rab zum pa// chu skyes bye dang zum pa'i yon tan skyon dag la// nyi ma rtog med 'dir ni 'phags pa'i nyi de bzhin// ji ltar nyi ma rtog med par rang 'od cig car spros 
71a5(mdo 'grel): pa yis// pad+ma rgyas par byed pa dang // gzhan dag smin par byed pa ltar// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa yi// nyi ma dam chos 'od zer dag/ gdul bya'i skye bo pad+ma la// rnam par rtog pa med par 'jug/ chos 
71a6(mdo 'grel): dang gzugs kyi sku dag ni// byang chub snying po'i mkhar shar ba// kun mkhyen nyi ma 'gro bar ni// ye shes 'od zer spro bar mdzad// gang phyir gdul bya dag pa yi// chu yi snod ni thams cad la// bde gshegs nyi 
71a7(mdo 'grel): ma'i gzugs brnyan ni// dpag tu med pa cig car 'char// rtag tu thams cad la khyab pa// chos dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil du ni// sangs rgyas nyi ma gdul bya yi// ri la ji ltar 'os par 'babs// ji ltar 
71a8(mdo 'grel): rgya chen 'od zer stong ldan nyi shar 'di// 'jig rten kun du snang bar byas nas rim gyis ni// mchog dang ma dman pa'i ri la 'bab de bzhin// rgyal ba'i nyi ma sems can tshegs la rim gyis 'bab// zhing kun nam mkha'i 
71b1(mdo 'grel): mthil sgo nyi ma la med la// mi shes mun bkab shes bya'i don ston pa yang min// mthu rje'i bdag nyid sna tshogs mdog bkye 'od tshogs kyis// gsal ba dag ni 'gro la shes bya'i don ston mdzad// sangs 
71b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas grong du gshegs tshe mig dang mi ldan pa yi skye bo rnams// mthong zhing don med cho gas bral don de mthong ba la sa ni myong ba dang // gti mug gis ljongs srid pa'i tsher lhung lta ba'i mun pas bsgribs pa rnams// 
71b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis blo snang ma mthong ba yi gnas mthong 'gyur// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni// rtog pa med kyang cig car du// spyod yul gnas pa rnams kyi ni// bsam kun so sor rdzogs byed ltar// de 
71b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin sangs rgyas yid bzhin la// brten nas bsam pa tha dad rnams// sna tshogs chos ni thos 'gyur yang // de ni de la rnam mi rtog/ ji ltar nor bu rin chen rtog med 'dod pa'i nor// 'bad pa med par gzhan pa dag la 
71b5(mdo 'grel): rab ster ltar// de bzhin thub pa 'bad med ji ltar 'os par ni// gzhan gyi don du srid pa ji srid rtag tu bzhugs// gang phyir rgya mtsho sa 'og gnas de la 'dod pas// ji ltar nor bu bzang po 'gro 'dir rab rnyed dka'// de bzhin// 
71b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba shin tu skal ngan nyon mongs zin// yid 'dir bde gshegs mthong ba rnyed dkar shes par bya// ji ltar smra brnyan gyi ni sgra// gnan gyi rnam rig las byung ba// rnam rtog med cing bzo med pa// phyi dang nang na mi gnas 
71b7(mdo 'grel): ltar// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung // gzhan gyi rnam rig las byung ba// rnam par rtog med bzo med cing // phyi dang nang na gnas ma yin// cung zad med cing snang ba med// dmigs pa med cing rten med 
71b8(mdo 'grel): pa// mig gi lam la ba 'das pa// gzugs med bstan du med pa yi// mkha' la ji ltar mtho dang dma'// mthong yang de ni de lta min// de bzhin thams cad sangs rgyas la// mthong yang de ni de la min//
